overview:
Chuck Doerr is President and COO of OpenFin. He is responsible for the company’s technology strategy and business operations.

Prior to OpenFin, Chuck was VP of CDS Technology at IntercontinentalExchange (ICE) where he was responsible for ICE’s CDS e-trading and processing technology and software development.

Before ICE, Chuck served as Chief Technology Officer of Creditex where he was responsible for all technology initiatives. He architected the company’s award-winning technology platform, led software development and managed Creditex’s global technology infrastructure.

Before Creditex, Chuck worked at UBS automating their front office equity trading operations. Earlier, he worked on missile system software at Raytheon. Chuck attended Carnegie Mellon University where he earned Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees in Electrical and Computer Engineering.
